messages.body: $SMH $SOXX $SOXL $NVDA $GOOGL $GOOG  $BABA $AAPL $FB $INTC It doesn't matter who gets there 1st. Consumers & investors will win in the end. https://www.cnbc.com/2018/04/21/alibaba-joins-google-others-in-making-custom-ai-chips.html

links.title: Why tech companies are racing each other to make their own custom A.I. chips
links.description: On Thursday, Alibaba said that its recently formed research and development arm -- dubbed the Academy for Discovery, Adventure, Momentum and Outlook -- has been working on an AI chip called the Ali-NPU and that the chips will become available for anyone to use through its public cloud, a spokesman told CNBC.

[NEW]  Weekend Reading List: "Walk, Don't Run" --> https://mailchi.mp/seeitmarket.com/weekend-reading-for-investors-walk-dont-run  feat. @KimbleCharting @WillieDelwiche 
 
$SPY $QQQ $AAPL $NFLX $GLD

links.title: Weekend Reading For Investors: Walk Don't Run
links.description: This week was a tale of two halves. The first half of the week saw stocks zoom higher, while the second half saw stocks sell off. In the end, the S&P 500 was up +0.5%. The market likes to prove "the majority" wrong... especially when uncertainty strikes.

$AAPL
1 Reason to Be Excited About Apple Inc.'s Upcoming Product Cycle -- The Motley Fool https://www.fool.com/investing/2018/04/22/1-reason-to-be-excited-about-apple-incs-upcoming-p.aspx

links.title: 1 Reason to Be Excited About Apple Inc.'s Upcoming Product Cycle
links.description: ( Apple's NASDAQ:AAPL) current product cycle got off to a bumpy start. The company announced three new iPhones in mid-September -- iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, and iPhone X -- but it only began shipping the former two in September. Apple didn't even begin taking pre-orders for the iPhone X until late October, and deliveries didn't begin until early November.
